Our Focus

Fun and Replayable Games for all

Projects

Check out our newest releases!

Compensation Social

Compenstion Social is a virtual-reality social application centered around its fun games and strong creation tools.

Compensation API

The Compensation VR Backend API, handling accounts, matchmaking, images, etc.

Compensation API

The Compensation API provides our users with the ability to edit their own profile, as well as view other's profiles.

Mesh Editor

The Compensation Social creation tools suite allows players to create highly detailed objects and vast landscapes, all inside VR.

Multiplayer

Photon Network multiplayer allows us to connect users in a physically grounded way, even from across the world.

Open Source

We pride ourselves on how much of our systems are open source. For example, our API for Compensation Social is 100% open to the public, for viewing and contribution. We accept contributions from open source projects without discrimination or hate.
